sentences.en: And all nouns have gender distinctions whether they refer to animate entities.
sentences.cn: 不管指称的实体是否有生命,所有名词都有性的差别.

sentences.en: Andy Genius is that energy which collects, combines, amplifies and animate.
sentences.cn: 天才,就是聚集 、 结合 、 放大和激活的能量.

sentences.en: Earlier filmmakers had found that animals were easier to animate than people.
sentences.cn: 早期的电影制片商发现动物比人更活泼.

sentences.en: He made no clear distinction between animate and inanimate things.
sentences.cn: 他对有生的和无生的东西缺乏明确的辨别.

sentences.en: Her skin is subtle, white, silken, animate.
sentences.cn: 她皮肤雪白, 细腻, 光滑, 充满活力.

sentences.en: I like animate animals and I enjoy watching animation.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢看卡通片,喜欢有生气的动物.

sentences.en: Laughter animated his face for a moment.
sentences.cn: 笑容使他的脸上一时增添了生气。

sentences.en: Natural philosophy involved the study of all aspects of the material world, animate and inanimate.
sentences.cn: 自然哲学涉及到了对包括有生命体与无生命体的物质世界的全面研究。

sentences.en: Our teacher tried to animate the math class by telling jokes.
sentences.cn: 我们老师说笑话,想让数学课活泼起来.

sentences.en: Performing process the program and demo animate are given.
sentences.cn: 文中给出了程序执行过程及动画演示.

sentences.en: Team spirited with demonstrated leadership skills to animate the team.
sentences.cn: 能够表现出领导技能的团队精神,激励团队.

sentences.en: The strange resolution of trustfulness he had taken seemed to animate even his secret conduct.
sentences.cn: 他定下的这个坦然无忌的怪决策好象连他私下的一举一动都添了生气.

sentences.en: The studio couldn't hand - animate the balloons, nor would traditional computer animation work.
sentences.cn: 该工作室不能手工动画的气球, 也将传统的电脑动画作品.

sentences.en: There was precious little about the cricket to animate the crowd.
sentences.cn: 板球比赛能激起观众热情的地方很少。

sentences.en: This paper proposes a technique to animate a painting given its image.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了一种面向静态绘画图像生成动画的新技术.

sentences.en: To animate in IK, first use the Create IK Target function.
sentences.cn: 为了创建IK动画, 首先需要创建IK目标.

sentences.en: Well, animators often use the fingernails on their thumbs to animate with.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 动画师们常用手指来做动画.

words.tran_cn: 活生生的；活泼的；愉快的
活泼，生气；激励；卡通片绘制
鼓舞者；赋与生气者；卡通片绘制者（等于animater）
赋予生命（animate的过去式和过去分词）
使有生气；使活泼；鼓舞；推动

trans.tran_cn: 使有生气，把…制成动画片，激励
trans.tran_en: to give life or energy to something

trans.tran_cn: 赋予生命； 使生机勃勃
trans.tran_en: to give life or energy to something
